Django News Application
  • Module Documentation
  • articles.views module

articles.views module

class articles.views.CustomLoginView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: LoginView

Use Django’s built-in login with our custom template.

template_name = 'registration/login.html'
articles.views.register(request)[source]

Register a new user and redirect to login on success.

articles.views.forgot_username(request)[source]

Email any usernames associated with the provided address.

Return type:

HttpResponse

articles.views.send_password_reset(request)[source]

Neutral response to prevent user enumeration.

articles.views.reset_user_password(request, token)[source]

GET: validate token and show form (no consumption). POST: on valid form, set password and consume token.

articles.views.article_feed(request)[source]

Redirect to newsfeed view for unified content display.

articles.views.newsfeed(request)[source]

Unified feed for Articles + Newsletters, newest first.

articles.views.browse_all_news(request)[source]

Display all approved articles and newsletters with search and filtering.

articles.views.subscriptions(request)[source]

Display and manage user subscriptions to publishers and journalists.

articles.views.approve_and_publish(request, kind, pk)[source]

Approve and publish an article or newsletter, with optional Twitter posting.
